An order of adjudication was passed on 22nd April

.

ps.

in

a

preferential

creditors

At

cash

balance

of

.31

cash

in

Thus, total amount available in the personal estate is

The Official Assignee has prayed for permission to

club

the

personal

estate

accounts

of

Insolvent

G.C.

Karnani

and

A.K.

Karnani and thereafter distribute

and

:2:

declare dividend amongst the Proved Preferential Creditors

of the said Insolvents firm M/s. Chaturbhujdas Karnani

from the said clubbed estate accounts.

.

Having regard to the circumstances set out in the

report

of

the Official Assignee, there is no reason

why

the

prayer

should not be granted.

Prayer clause (a)

of

the report of the Official Assignee is accordingly

granted.
